chapters.title: Chapter 17: Heading West
chapters.info: Aludra, p. 330 (234)—Slender woman who does fireworks for Luca's menagerie. She was cast out of the Illuminators' Guild because she was blamed for spoiling the performace for King Galldrian of Cairhien. The problem was actually Tammuz's fault (or so they thought), but she was a more convenient target. The mishap for Galldrian was actually caused by Rand al'Thor. See also su Riatin Rie, Galldrian.
